level.heading: Costs and execution.
level.text: The Probate Court may render judgment for costs against the unsuccessful party in any proceeding conducted in the court, and issue execution thereof.

level.heading: Cross References
level.text: Fees and costs in civil proceedings, see § 15-701 et seq.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 3-85
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-85, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 16-3102.
